value:
$WmMPID_フロリーナ,ch03_00_Lin_FF_Pair,Face|Ah! Stay next to me, Lady Lyndis!$k$p$nMPID_比翼リン|Florina, it's hard to walk with
you so close.$k$p$nMPID_フロリーナ|There are just so many people at
the festival! It feels like everyone
is looking at me...$k$p$nMPID_比翼リン|Well, it's because you look good
in that outfit, right? They like your
festival costume!$k$p$nMPID_フロリーナ|I-I don't know about that! If anyone
should be getting looks, it's you!$k$p$nMPID_比翼リン|Me? This isn't much different from
what I usually wear...$k$pWell, do you think you can put that
aside for the festival tournament?$k$p$nMPID_フロリーナ|I don't know... It must be nice
to be able to ignore everyone.
People seem so carefree...$k$p$nMPID_比翼リン|You're right. Even Navarre over there!
He's as calm as a lake's surface on a
windless day—as always, I suppose.$k$pI know what we'll do! Let's ask
Navarre what his secret is!$k$pNavarre surely knows some way
to help stay present in the moment.
He's mastered the art of focus!$k$p$nMPID_フロリーナ|R-really? But, Lady Lydis, isn't he
kind of...threatening?$k$p$nMPID_比翼リン|We are all friends of the Order
of Heroes here! I am sure he
won't bite. Now, let's go!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_比翼リン,ch03_00_Lin_FF_Pair,Face|...And that is why we want you to
teach us the art of staying present
in the moment—on the battlefield!$k$p$WmMPID_忍者ナバール,ch01_02_Nabarl_M_Ninja20,Face|I am not here to make friends.
Go away.$k$p$WmMPID_フロリーナ,ch03_00_Lin_FF_Pair,Face|H-Hey...$k$p$nMPID_比翼リン|Hmph. A stubborn one, are you?
All right, Navarre, then you leave us
no choice! We'll steal the secrets!$k$pThrough careful observation, we will
learn everything we need to know...
That's the mark of a true ninja!$k$p$nMPID_フロリーナ|I-is it true that ninja steal?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_忍者ナバール,ch01_02_Nabarl_M_Ninja20,Face|Not bad. I have to retreat.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼リン,ch03_00_Lin_FF_Pair,Face|I see... Even outmatched, not the
slightest bit of agitation. I should
have expected nothing less!$k$p$nMPID_フロリーナ|Lady Lyndis, stop taking notes!
We have to get out of here!$k$p$Sbs150|
